Event.Message: Failed with status %3 in file %1 on line %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="File" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Offset" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Offset" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: TRANSFER %1: %2 (%3), RQ: %4, DMA: %5, BytesReq: %6, BytesProg: %7, BytesTrans: %8, SG: %9/%10, TRB:%11/%12
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Stage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Endpoint" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PhysicalEndpoint" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Request" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Transaction" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="BytesRequested" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BytesProgrammed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BytesTransferred" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="SgProgrammed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SgLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TrbProgrammed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TrbLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Endpoint" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PhysicalEndpoint" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Index" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Word1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Word2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Word3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Word4" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Endpoint" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PhysicalEndpoint" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Command" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Parameter0" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Parameter1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Parameter2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <struct name="fSynopsysEndpoint"> <data name="WDFDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Endpoint" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </struct> <struct name="fSynopsysEndpointDescriptor"> <data name="fid_bLength" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> <data name="fid_bDescriptorType" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> <data name="fid_bEndpointAddress" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> <data name="fid_bmAttributes" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> <data name="fid_wMaxPacketSize" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="fid_bInterval" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <struct name="fChargerDetectionErrorInfo"> <data name="WDFDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="USBCMD" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="PORTSC1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="OTGSC" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <struct name="fDeterminePortTypeFailed"> <data name="WDFDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Configuration" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Control" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="EnabledEvents" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Connected Standby: %1, Idle Residency: %2, Device Power State: %3, Connected: %4, Port Type: %5, USB Device State: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ConnectedStandby" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IdleResidency" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="DevicePowerState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Connected" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UsbPortType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="UsbDeviceState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
